text:
A teacher wrote to the Premier asking for more supports & custodial staff to keep schools safe during the pandemic.

Like teachers don't have enough to do. But Mr. Kenney says "tidying up" COVID-19 is part of their job.

What an arrogant, ignorant response.

#ableg #abed https://t.co/zvsiSFQOVp
